channel.title: Forum Template Setup?
channel.description:
Hey everyone my original post was about how to setup a forums via mybb
i have now managed to setup the forums but i have a problem
i wanted to add an index page and pages and have a forum page that takes you to the mybb forums
but the mybb forums seems to have a load of files and content? currently its the main page
should i move all the content into a folder called forums but then how do i redirect a forum page to go into a folder???
Ok i have have now managed to fix that issue to because the forums is a .php so for exmaple site/index.php and the index is .html
so i created the index.html and a forum page to index.php
ok so now i have a new issue again
i wanted to update the theme of mybb so i delete any images or just add more images to the current standard mybb images?

item.title: Forum Template Setup?
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:7, topic:551343”]You should explore the options in the Admin CP before going any further. Or even use google.

This I very trivial issue. There is a spot in the control panel for managing themes.[/quote]

This, use the Admin CP and google how to use it to do what you want. You shouldn’t need to be deleting any files belonging to mybb.

This tutorial shows you how to add a new theme to mybb

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Template Setup?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

You should explore the options in the Admin CP before going any further. Or even use google.

This I very trivial issue. There is a spot in the control panel for managing themes.

Read full topic

Updated issue

item.title: Forum Template Setup?
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:551343”]Templates are not forums…

Templates are templates.

If you want myBB forums, then download it from this website.

I don’t know what “website manager control panel” you have, but if it allows FTP and you have access to the MySQL Tables, then you can install the forums.
If you don’t have both of those… Well you’re essentially out of luck.[/quote]

++ for suggesting MyBB.

Read full topic

If you don’t have both of those… Well you’re essentially out of luck.[/quote]

ahh ok mate would you be able to give me a hand?

Read full topic
